# isFileReferenceURL()

**Instance Method**

Returns whether the URL is a file reference URL.

## Declaration

```swift
func isFileReferenceURL() -> Bool
```

## Return Value

[doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the URL is a file reference URL; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Querying an NSURL

- **checkResourceIsReachableAndReturnError(_:)**: Returns whether the resource pointed to by a file URL can be reached.
- **isFileURL**: A boolean value that determines whether the receiver is a file URL.
